title: Account features on leageoflegends.com
body:
Forgive me if I've posted in the wrong place or this discussion exists elsewhere.

Why isn't it possible to access rune and mastery pages, item sets, and even the store when logged into a browser on leagueoflegends.com instead of the client?

It would be great to be able to access these features on computers that don't already have the client downloaded so we can dive into pre-game content and planning.

Thoughts on this or a response from anyone a Riot appreciated.

Cheers,
lloydhavemercy

replies.body:
I'd recommend bringing up this discussion in the [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) sub-board, as [Help & Support](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce) isn't necessarily the best place for those types of discussions. 

Alternatively, you can always drop a question to Riot in the [Ask Riot](https://ask.leagueoflegends.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) website!
